name: Injection π23 'Ars regia'
description:
Classic survival horror focused on puzzle solving, exploration and strategy.
Part II of 'Injection π23' trilogy.



Take control of a lonely and isolated person who is looking for his lost dog and finds himself involved in a dark conspiracy.

Cryptic story about conspiracies, mind control and the human condition. Story inspired by real and historical events
Three different endings.
Lots of collectibles and secrets.
Extra game modes and unlockable features.
Scenario based on a real town in Malaga-Andalucía-Spain



interchangeable views at any time:
  • Third person (free and autocam)
  • First person
  • Classic cameras/fixed angles (modern control or 'tank control')
